incidents.name: Issues Accessing the Latest Messaging Logs

incident_updates.body: Twilio messaging logs were degraded for 43 minutes between 12:46 AM and 1:29 AM Pacific Time on 10/22/2023. During this period of time, customers may have experienced issues seeing their messaging logs through the TPM API or Messaging Console, as the logs were 20 minutes stale. The issue has now been resolved.
Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with the Messaging logs. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

incidents.name: Connectivity Lost on ~23% of Super SIM Devices

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing data connectivity issues on AT&T. This incident has been resolved.

Currently, based on our monitoring systems, all devices which were affected by the data connectivity issues on AT&T should have a re-established data connection. Our engineering team is actively working alongside the affected network provider to continue monitoring the issue. In the meantime, we kindly suggest that customers reset the connectivity through the console if they notice that some of their SIM cards are still experiencing issues. This can often help re-establish a stable connection for the affected devices. We will provide another update in 2 hours or sooner as soon as we have more information available.

Beginning at 11:05 UTC, we observed ~23% of active data sessions on Super SIM being dropped. Impact is limited to devices connected over AT&T in the US. Devices that attempted to reconnect immediately after losing connectivity should have been able to successfully reconnect to the redundant instances while the impacted one recovered. Our engineering team is actively working with the affected network provider to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or sooner once more information becomes available

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue Customers might experience Super SIM Connectivity Issues. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incident_updates.body: Twilio billing was degraded for 22 hours and 9 minutes between 10:42 AM Pacific Time on 10/25/2023 and 8:51 AM Pacific Time on 10/26/2023. incidents.name: Error 63013 With Verify WhatsApp

incident_updates.body: We have implemented a fix on the WhatsApp channel for the Verify API, and we no longer are experiencing 63013 errors when sending Verify WhatsApp messages. This incident has been resolved.

The issue causing an increase in error 63013 when using the Verify API with the WhatsApp channel has been identified. Our team is actively working on a fix that is targeted for deployment tomorrow morning Mountain Daylight Time (MDT). We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

The issue causing an increase in error 63013 when using the Verify API with the WhatsApp channel has been identified. Our team is actively working on a fix that is targeted for deployment tomorrow morning Mountain Daylight Time (MDT). We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still investigating an increase in error 63013 when using the Verify API with the WhatsApp channel. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
